question.text: You are approaching unmarked crossroads. How should you deal with this type of junction?

explanation.text: Be extra-cautious, especially when your view is restricted by hedges, bushes, walls and large vehicles etc. In the summer months these junctions can become more difficult to deal with when growing foliage may obscure your view.

answer.text: Accelerate and keep to the middle
Slow down and keep to the right
Slow down and look both ways
